One of the things I miss the most about America is the plethora of "fake meat," meaning good veg-burgers.  Most places in the States will make a Gardenburger along with the meat fare, but that trend hasn't reached here as of yet.Their burgers are crafted on-site and quite flavorful.  Strangely enough, I had been here for almost a year and only found it when a vegetarian chef friend visited from the UK and told me about it. (Now, we're all glad that Yelp is here so I can find more stuff like this!)The bar itself is quite fun and a great stop on the way to/from somewhere.  Everyone can eat there and even the most die hard carnivores enjoy the food.
